feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Build Work Zone, advanced edition
feed.subtitle: SAP Build Work Zone, advanced edition Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Migrate Work Zone Advanced between BTP regions
entry.content:
Hi,

we have created a 3-tier landscape of Work Zone Advancced for a customer in EU10 (Frankfurt) and now we need to migrate it to Switzerland - Zurich data center (as WZ wasn't available in that region at the beginning).

Is there some kind of migration tool available or on the roadmap for BTP Services to be migrated between regions, or we will have to just simply re-do the whole configuration in a new BTP region?

entry.title: SAP SuccessFactors Work Zone Performance
entry.content:
Dear Community,

we are close to GoLive with SAP Work Zone SuccessFactors Edition and experience massive drops in the performance of the overall page loading times. 

The home page as currently a loading time of about 20 seconds, which is not acceptable for Work Zone to be used as the new HR Portal for all employees.

Are there any ideas, what we can do to improve the performance? Or is this a SAP topic? We also already created a ticket with support, however mayber there are some valuable insights from the community.

Thank you for any help,
Sebastian

SAP SuccessFactors Work Zone

entry.title: Work zone differences and widgets
entry.content:
Hi, sorry. How can I see the templates for de SAP Bussiness Workzone and the widgets that I can use?

Also, what is the difference between SAP Build Work zone and SAP SuccessFactors Work Zone?

Thanks a lot!

entry.title: Why don't WorkZone pages print like normal web pages?
entry.content:
My users need to print Workzone pages to PDF from time to time - policies and guidance, that type of content.

The browser's print function doesn't work with Workzone the way other web pages do.

I can't show screen grabs for confidentiality, but workzone will only print the area of the page currently displayed in the viewport.:

  • If you're at the top of a long workzone page, the browser print function will print the top area of the page currently displayed
  • If you're scrolled part way down the page, print will only print the portion currently displayed

This is nuts.

I've never seen a browser print function behave this way before.

What's going on and how do I fix it?

entry.title: Rework required for Fiori apps exposed in SAP Workzone containing calls to external data sources?
entry.content:
Dear community,
I have this problem with a Fiori app exposed in SAP Workzone. The app contains a call to an archive server to fetch image data (of a scanned invoice). The app works fine when the user is logged in to the company intranet, but is not able to retrieve the image when logged on only to SAP Workzone, because the user's browser cannot reach the archive server (which is not exposed to Internet).

It seems to me that the only way to make the app work in SAP Workzone is to replace the client-side call to the external data source with a server-side call. That way the SAP Back-end would execute the call, fetch the data and push it to the SAP Workzone user.

In general this code rework should be done for all Fiori apps that use external (not part of the back-end) data sources. 
Or am I wrong here?

entry.title: Cannot Update Content Package Due to ID Mismatch in SAP Build Work Zone
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I'm currently working with SAP Build Work Zone and encountered an issue while trying to update an existing content package.

Iâ€™m getting the following error message:

"Trying to upload a content package with a different ID than the ID of the existing content package."

Here is what Iâ€™ve done:

  • I modified the content and re-zipped it with the correct structure (manifest.json, artifacts/, i18n/ at root level).

  • In the manifest.json, the sap.package.id is still exactly the same:

    json
     
    { "sap.package": { "id": "cnma.contentPackage" } }

The strange thing is:

  • I uploaded a similar package 2 days ago with the same ID, and it worked fine. Now even small changes result in this error.

Looking forward to your advice and experience.
Appreciate your support! ðŸ™Œ

But when i try to update the content package in the Channel Manager, it's showing an error message which i am attaching below. The ID remains same in the manifest file but still it's shows uploading with different ID. Please help me!!

 

@jens_kristen , can you please help me!

entry.title: Multiple employments in Workzone, how do you handle user multiple employment user data?
entry.content:
Within SuccessFactors you can have multiple employments at the same time, this is typically for global assignment / international mobility use cases. This means both records are active at the same time, the user has one email address, etc. They are for our purposes the same user in WorkZone. 

WorkZone only has 1 profile for each user and then has an employment switcher in the top right when you have multiple employments, this essentially switches the active 'userId' when interacting with UI cards.

However, how do people handle access to workspaces based on employment data? Keeping the example simple is as follows:

Regardless of execution of the records, only one of them will fill in the country field. So, the answer I thought was simply using custom attributes! Do a check based on primary assignment, fill the address for Country A and custom attribute for Country B. However, WorkZone does not support PATCH requests so will delete data if not filled in.

So, how do others do it? How do you take employee data from 2 records and merge them into WorkZone using IPS? I can imagine how to do it using other tools, because you would GET all the existing data and just pass in the additional data. OR obviously PATCH requests would be excellent if supported and make this a non issue, but sadly they are not. 

What are others doing in this instace? Handling workspace assignments using something other than dynamic user lists? We've also used SF Permission Groups synced into WZ, however we hit a technical limit of groups (~100) so need to ideally use dynamic user lists/ something automatic not based on permission groups.

entry.title: Issue: SAC story is not visible in SAP Build Workzone - - Content Security Policy Issue on Trial Acc
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

Iâ€™m using an SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) trial account and have created a story that I want to embed in SAP Work Zone.

However, when I click on the Work Zone tile, the SAC tenant refuses to connect. In the browser console, I see the following error:

Error: *"Refused to frame '<SAC Tenant URL>' because an ancestor violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "frame-ancestors "."

SAP documentation suggests the following resolution:

Go to: Main Menu > System > Administration > App Integration,
and add your origin under the Trusted Origins section.

But the issue is â€” this App Integration section doesnâ€™t appear to be available in the SAC trial account.

Has anyone faced this issue before? Is there a workaround or any way to allow embedding from a trial SAC account?

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you!

SAP Analytics Cloud  SAP Build Work Zone, advanced edition

entry.title: SAP work zone site tile is not loading in i-frames when clicked second time after opening one tile.
entry.content:
2025-07-17 09:48:01.663500 App-defined navigation mode is not valid! - Fallback to URL Template's capability sap.ushell.ApplicationType

Issue replication: 

01) configured Fiori tiles My Inbox, Manage sales order, Manage sales order.

02) open sap work zone site and click on My Inbox tile OPENS.
03) Nav back to home page click on any tile app is not loading. - miss match in iframe container parent id
04) each time need to refresh home page to open\navigate on click on tile.

tiles, catalog, spaces are exposed from backend system.

Tried changing sap ui5 version from site URL sap-ui-version=****

Authentication we are using user id and password  to backend

change in iframe container parent id when navigate back and trued to click on another tile.

entry.title: What has happened to Workzone page layouts with the latest release??!!
entry.content:
The latest Workzone release now accommodates an 8 column wide grid (previously 6 was the max) and the overall page max-width has increased. It also behaves differently than before with varying screen width: previously there were fixed dimensions at different break points. Now is scales elastically.

What this means is now my entire site, built on a 6 column grid with the old max-width just looks terrible.

I am super unhappy about this.

I can't believe SAP has made this change unilaterally with no way to flip back. The balance and proportions that I've been working with months are now wrong with two weeks before launch. It's a huge disrespect. Frowny emoticon to SAP.

entry.title: How to use local copy parameters html5 application on work zone advanced such as adding variant ID
entry.content:
Hello,

We have Work Zone Advanced and have built and deployed various HTML5 apps via Business Application Studio running on Cloud Foundry using OData v4. No backend content to systems such as S/4HANA, all local to BTP. 

We are creating local copies of the deployed dynamic applications to manage dynamic content for counters and titles. We are attempting to have the applications open with preselected filters but are having issues. 

  1. Cannot use operators or regular expressions for filtering fields and sorting in the parameters with the content manager local copy of the application.
    • We have attempted various ways in both the Navigation and Visualization tabs for setting filter and sorting with only success with single values and equals as the operator. For example, we cannot find a way to filter for filter = <empty>
  2. As an alternate method we attempted to follow instructions to map a variant as part of the parameters, however this was also not successful.
    • We collected the variant id from dev tools > network > changes?sap-language=en and collecting the filename such as 
      • fileName: "id_1754739886907_236_flVariant"
      • fileType: "ctrl_variant"
      • layer: "PUBLIC"
    • We followed the guides to add the parameter variable such as sap-ui-fe-variant-id and others in the link below as well as variantKey, however none of which worked. This could be due to potentially a wrong variant id however we only see one fileName captured in the Network during a variant save event as described above. 
      • https://help.sap.com/docs/ABAP_PLATFORM_NEW/468a97775123488ab3345a0c48cadd8f/4132ffa02f1148058a78dfb11c8567b0.html 

 

The guidance and documentation on the usages of the navigation and visualization parameters within the work zone advance content manager UI is not clear. The general question is there clear guidance on how to setup parameters, what parameters can be used, how to open the app with a defined variant etc.?

entry.title: Work Zone: text widgets in a single row, height no longer aligns
entry.content:
Work Zone has once again unilaterally changed the way it behaves with the result of messing up my design.

Until this morning (13 Aug 25) when adding text widgets to a single row (a freestyle section with multiple columns), text widgets were presented as the same height, regardless of how much text was in each.

See example, below: each of the three elements has a different amount of text (2 lines, 3 lines, 1 line), but the white boxes all displayed with the same height as the largest box.

Perfect - a nice balanced design.

Now here's what it looks like:

The text widget height is controlled by the amount of text in each widget. My design looks like a row of wonky teeth. Thanks SAP.

So what has happened and why? When are we going to get consulted or at the very least notified in advance of these sorts of changes? See my other posts for other rants about SAP changing the front end unilaterally. 

Honestly SAP, you are consistently disappointing. If you expect us to promote your product in any way you need to get better at this.

entry.title: Fallback method for opening web applications in iframe if loading fails
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am trying to implement a fallback mechanism for opening a web application inside an iframe. If the app fails to load in the iframe, I want to automatically open it in a new browser tab.

Hereâ€™s are the implementations that I have tried so far, I am providing a brute code of the methods that I have tried implementing:

onTilePress: function (oEvent) {
    var sUrl = oEvent.getSource().getBindingContext("appModel").getProperty("url");
    var oFrame = this.byId("appFrame");

    // attachAfterRendering for iframe handling
    oFrame.attachAfterRendering({ url: sUrl }, function (oEvent, oData) {
        var iframe = document.querySelector("iframe");

        if (!iframe) {
            console.error("Iframe not found");
            return;
        }

        // Listen for load success/failure
        iframe.onload = function () {
            console.log("App loaded successfully in iframe");
        };

        iframe.onerror = function () {
            console.error("Error loading app in iframe, opening in new tab");
            window.open(oData.url, "_blank");
        };

        // Safety fallback - message event listener
        window.addEventListener("message", function (e) {
            console.log("Message received from origin:", e.origin);
            // Expected origin is from embedded app, but I only get the portal origin here
        });

        // Detach afterrendering after execution
        oFrame.detachAfterRendering();
    });
}

 

Challenges I am facing:

  1. iframe.onload and iframe.onerror are never triggered â€“ not even for successful apps.

  2. onAfterRendering only detects the UI5 HTML control render, not the internal iframe load state.

  3. When listening for postMessage, I get the custom portal origin (e.g., https://port8081-workspaces...) instead of the embedded appâ€™s origin, so I cannot distinguish failures correctly.


    Can someone please help me to find a correct way to detect if an app inside an iframe has failed to load in SAP UI5 (so that I can implement a proper fallback to open it in a new tab)?
    Also suggest if is there a recommended UI5 mechanism to achieve this?

    Thanks in advance,
    Sai Krishna.

entry.title: Moving Gmail Inbox Emails to Subfolders Using Message ID in SAP Build Process Automation
entry.content: Hi  Everyone , I am currently working with SAP Build Process Automation on a use case where I need to manage Gmail emails. The requirement is to identify an email in the Inbox using the unique Message ID provided by Gmail and then move this email from the Inbox to a custom subfolder within the Inbox. I have tried using the Move Email (Online) activity, but I am facing challenges as the activity does not seem to recognize the custom subfolder, and the process fails when I attempt to move the email using the Message ID. I would like to know the recommended approach for fetching Gmail emails based on Message ID and the correct way to configure the target folder path when moving emails into subfolders or labels. Any guidance, best practices, or configuration examples from the community would be greatly appreciated.

entry.title: Performance difference between SAP BTP Free Account and Paid Account?
entry.content:
Hi Community,

Iâ€™m currently working with an SAP BTP Free Account and Iâ€™ve noticed some performance limitations when running applications and services (for example, SAP Build Apps, CAP services, and OData calls).

Before moving to a paid account, Iâ€™d like to understand:

  • Are there any performance differences (speed, responsiveness, system resources) between Free and Paid accounts?

  • Do paid accounts get more consistent service levels (e.g., CPU/memory allocation, faster response times, higher quotas)?

  • Is there any official documentation or benchmarks comparing Free vs. Paid accounts?

Iâ€™d really appreciate insights from anyone who has tested both environments or moved from Free to Paid.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Error in Build Work Zone, advanced edition Initial Setup
entry.content:
Hi Folks.


After following the SAP Documentation, I have completed the Prerequisites and Booster step to configure the SAP Build Work Zone, advanced editon in our landscape:

https://help.sap.com/docs/build-work-zone-advanced-edition/sap-build-work-zone-advanced-edition/onboarding-to-sap-build-work-zone-advanced-edition

 

After completing the booster, we need to trgger the set up as per the below step which is run configurator:

https://help.sap.com/docs/build-work-zone-advanced-edition/sap-build-work-zone-advanced-edition/run-configurator

Option 1 -> Step 2 -> Set Up Environment

 

When doing Trigger Setup in the Work Zone, I am getting the error "createCompany, Not Found". PFA the error screen shot for your reference.

All the step are correct and there is not much error log to troubleshoot issue.

Please let me know if anyone face the same issue and solution for same.


Thanks.


Regards,

Rohit Gera

entry.title: C_WZADM_2404 Exam (SAP Build Work Zone) - Guidance for Preparing SAP Certified Associate
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

Iâ€™m planning to take the SAP Certified Associate â€“ SAP Build Work Zone Implementation and Administration (C_WZADM_2404) exam. Iâ€™ve reviewed the Learning Journey and the exam topics like Solution Architecture, Extensibility, Integration, and Overview, but Iâ€™m still unsure how to structure my preparation effectively.

For those who have already taken this certification:

Which areas did you find the most challenging?

Are the official Learning Journey and practice materials enough, or should I look into additional resources?

Any tips on managing time during the 60 questions / 2-hour exam?

Appreciate any insights or personal experiences you can share.

Thanks in advance!
